project.name: J-C390A-CMUD-01-ST03-DT01-DF18-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes a filename and attemps to read and output to the screen. If the file does not exist, it swallows the FileNotFoundException, and subsequently dies on a NullPointerException.

iopair.name: J-C390A-CMUD-01-ST03-DT01-DF18-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

process.file: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

process.script: sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="file.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

if [[ -f "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/cmud__early_kill_T1HT3poDEo.sh.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/logs/execute/cmud__early_kill_T1HT3poDEo.sh.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_XyKqX7hrl0P5Wp7Gl5bR AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (runtime_exception_IW8ej1xAjo) AND NOT timeout_GGExhE6iNv) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((runtime_exception_IW8ej1xAjo) OR timeout_GGExhE6iNv OR controlled_exit_j0hFcXXO0q)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (runtime_exception_IW8ej1xAjo) AND NOT timeout_GGExhE6iNv) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((runtime_exception_IW8ej1xAjo) OR timeout_GGExhE6iNv OR controlled_exit_j0hFcXXO0q))

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
